synopsis.text: Digital Friends have transformed into destructive entities known as 'Shade', all due to Arc Ruler's declaration to reshape the world. In this sequel to Shadowverse Flame: Seven Shadows-hen, Light and his allies are tasked with neutralizing three towers orchestrating global devastation. Equipped with the powerful 'Negza System', they embark on a perilous journey to defeat the Shade and save the world from impending doom. The battle to determine the world's fate has begun!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
